medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of hypoparathyroidism were diagnosed in the neonatal period. The children presented with severe growth failure, indicating ongoing progression of metabolic issues.
medical_history.past_medical_history: All patients diagnosed with hypoparathyroidism and growth failure, with relevant clinical features suggestive of HRD syndrome, including GH deficiency and various degrees of developmental delays.
medical_history.family_history: Positive family history of HRD syndrome with siblings and cousins affected.
medical_history.social_history: Nonconsanguineous parents of Middle Eastern origin for some cases; consanguineous parents noted for others.
